level.heading: Enforcement.
level.text: A violation of this subchapter is a violation of Chapter 39 of Title 28, for which a fine of not more than $10,000 may be adjudged.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 16-191 validated a previously made technical correction.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 15-164
level.text: For Law 15-164, see notes following ยง 48-831.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 16-191
level.text: For Law 16-191, see notes following ยง 48-831.10.
